meanings.definition: A person who fails to fulfill a financial obligation.
meanings.sent1: The defaulters were unable to pay back the money they owed.
meanings.sent2: The bank had to take legal action against the defaulters for not repaying their loans.
meanings.sent3: The defaulters realized they had spent all their money on unnecessary things.
meanings.sent4: The defaulters were drowning in a sea of debt with no lifeboat in sight.
meanings.sent5: The image of the defaulters struggling to make ends meet was heartbreaking.

meanings.definition: A person who fails to perform a duty or meet an obligation.
meanings.sent1: The defaulters neglected their responsibilities and caused chaos.
meanings.sent2: The defaulters failed to show up for work, leaving their tasks unfinished.
meanings.sent3: The defaulters forgot to do their chores and ended up with a messy house.
meanings.sent4: The defaulters were like missing puzzle pieces, leaving the whole picture incomplete.
meanings.sent5: The teacher reminded the defaulters of their homework, but they still didn't complete it.
